title: Mom, baby and grandmother gunned in cold blood by perp who hides bloody clothes and weapons in woods.
itunes:title: Mom, baby and grandmother gunned in cold blood by perp who hides bloody clothes and weapons in woods.
description:
Teen Matthew Bernard kills his mother, sister, nephew, and the family dog. The question remains as to why. Police are looking to data from a recovered cell phone for an explanation. Joining Nancy Grace today: Ken Belkin, NY criminal defense attorney; John Cardillo, Former NYPD; Dr. Caryn Stark, Psychologist; Dr. Michelle Dupree, Medical Examiner; reporter Levi Page Investigative Reporter Crime Online.com.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
